== Ubuntu Firewall Distribution ==

This will provide information on the planned Ubuntu firewall distribution.

It will be based around Ubuntu server edition and likely use the current Dapper Drake LTS - for it's 5 year support cycle.

It will based around a web-based management interface, similar to existing firewall distributions.

Although other perfectly adequate solution existing using other distribution exist; this is being created to add the Ubuntu "cando" and to passively promote Ubuntu.

Once the first edition is released this project will be registered with launchpad.

=== Project Name? ===
Current ideas for the official name (feel free to add):
* RouBuntu
* FireBuntu
* GateBuntu
